name: Buff Man & Jump Man
description:
Jump Man and Buff Man! Two heroes braving a dangerous (and dare I say cute?) world together! Buff Man can punch but can't jump. Jump Man is quick but can't fight. Using the strengths of each, solve retro pixel platform levels.

The game fits the theme because the player controls two heroes a la Ice Climbers, the classic gaming duo. All the puzzles require a pair to solve, and each hero cannot work without the other one.

Assets from:
https://freesounds.org, 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360,
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-2-155418,
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/mine-tileset-43476
